properties.name: xxl.job.executor.admin-addresses
properties.description: xxlJob服务端地址，注意不要以`/`结尾.

properties.name: xxl.job.executor.app-name
properties.description: 执行器名称，请使用项目名.

properties.name: xxl.job.executor.ip
properties.description: 执行器ip，不填写可以自动推断.

properties.name: xxl.job.executor.port
properties.description: 执行器端口，填写0为自动推断.

properties.name: xxl.job.executor.access-token
properties.description: 加密通信，内网使用可不填写.
